headline.main: Half Naples Evacuated in Fear Of Mines as Power Is Restored; AMG and Army Move 500,000 Residents Out as Electricity Is Turned On Again, Lest Flows of Current Start Blasts

lead_paragraph: NAPLES, Nov. 1 -- One of the most extraordinary evacuations in modern history took place in Naples today.
abstract: half of Naples evacuted in fear of mines as elec power is restored
snippet: NAPLES, Nov. 1 -- One of the most extraordinary evacuations in modern history took place in Naples today....
